text_block_list.text:
A few days after Fuji Kiseki saved<n>me by finding my
badge, I see her<n>speaking with a younger student near<n>the
school gates.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I see. So that's what is troubling you.

text_block_list.name: Junior Student A
text_block_list.text:
Right... I've always wanted to be like<n>my sister and race in
the Twinkle<n>Series, but there's no way with my<n>run
record.

text_block_list.name: Junior Student A
text_block_list.text:
You know, when she was my age,<n>she was already
race-ready. I just<n>don't have any talent, huh...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Hm...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
"Alas, the sword is heavy in hand,<n>and the path of thorns
cuts deep. I<n>fear I cannot go on."

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
"The valiant heroes who saved the<n>people once held firm
their swords of<n>deliverance, and cut a path forward<n>
through this hill of piercing thorns."

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
"But I... I cannot. And I could never.<n>Such burden, such pain...
I, who cannot<n>bear it, have not the right to be called<n>a
hero."

text_block_list.name: Junior Student A
text_block_list.text: Uh, Fuji?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Overcome with despair, she falls to<n>the ground. But then a
girl appears<n>who had been watching over her<n>since
childhood.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
The girl speaks to the woebegone<n>hero. "So long as you do
not let go, the<n>right to be a hero will ever be in your<n>
hands."

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
"Never forget, your will is yours<n>forever. You needn't hold a
sword,<n>nor run through ripping thorns. You<n>will always
have your own path to<n>follow."

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
The hero then casts her sword and<n>armor aside, and with
naught but her<n>own self, she ascends the hill of<n>thorns.
With her honed fist, she<n>vanquishes the evil and saves the<n>
kingdom.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Trust in all your years of training, and<n>believe in your own
will... Okay?

text_block_list.name: Junior Student A
text_block_list.text: My training and my will...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Yes! Blame not your differences with<n>your sister. Instead,
try to look within.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
There is a path out there—one which<n>can be traversed by
you alone!

text_block_list.name: Junior Student A
text_block_list.text: Fuji!

Overcome with emotion, the young<n>runner begins to cry, but
finds comfort<n>in Fuji Kiseki's kind touch. Finally,<n>she
departs with a look of relief on her<n>face.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Oh? Could it be? The trainer from<n>before!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
So you saw all that. I'd like to keep<n>private matters private.
You mustn't<n>tell anyone.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
You really think she feels better?<n>Well, if a passing trainer
thinks so, I<n>suppose it must be true.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I know it's hard to keep a smile on<n>your face all the time...
But I want to at<n>least make the little ones happy when<n>I'm
around.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
My own words lack the same<n>poignancy, so I quoted
something<n>from when I saw my mother onstage.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I'll be glad if it lightened the weight on<n>her heart, even if
only a little.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: That she is! And quite a famous one<n>in those circles.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Her performances are nothing short<n>of legendary! When
she appears<n>onstage, one mere utterance rivets<n>the entire
audience.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
And at each play's end, the theater<n>rumbles with
thunderous applause!<n>You can imagine the joy on each<n>
person's face!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: My mother is the greatest entertainer<n>I've ever known!
choice_data_list:
And so you want to bring that same joy to
others now.

And so you want to bring that same joy to
others now.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Correct you are. Admiring my mother<n>onstage was the start
of it. I even<n>thought to follow in her footsteps onto<n>the big
stage at first.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
But as you can see... it wasn't meant<n>to be. I was
heartbroken, facing the<n>chasm between who I wanted to
be...<n>and reality.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
That's when my mother quoted those<n>lines to me. And she
said, "There's<n>more than one path. Learn to expand<n>your
horizons."

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
So after searching and searching for<n>a new path to follow, I
finally found it...<n>racing.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: When I first set foot on the turf, I...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that's right. It's come time for me<n>to race in a
scrimmage.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: If it pleases you, you must come to<n>watch me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Obviously, I go to see Fuji Kiseki's<n>race. There, I become
truly captivated...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Haah!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
S-such beautiful running! Look at that<n>polished form, that
elegant<n>movement... I'm totally enchanted!

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text: And the way she accelerates isamazing! Just how fast can she go?!This is so exciting!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I'll put on a miracle of a performance<n>that will make
everyone smile!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: For I... am the miracle of the turf, Fuji<n>Kiseki!

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: YEEEAAAH!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I've never heard such a surge of<n>applause at a scrimmage!
This shows<n>how captivating she really is!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki, that was an incredible<n>race! I would love to talk
to you about<n>becoming your trainer!

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text: That goes for me too!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Hehehe, hearing such words brings<n>me great joy! But you
must forgive<n>me. Unfortunately, I'm not accepting<n>any
offers at this time.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
First, you see, I must prove to every<n>trainer at the tryouts
that I have what it<n>takes.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
So you would like to give everyone a<n>fair shot at seeing
what kind of racer<n>you really are... All right, I'll look<n>
forward to it.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Thank you, one and all!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
So long as there are people hoping for<n>a miraculous race, it
is this<n>entertainer's mission to give them a<n>show to
remember.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I invite you to enjoy the tryouts to<n>your heart's content!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki's remarks have a dignity<n>and strength that
convey her<n>readiness for anything that comes.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: No matter the stage, I shall entertain<n>one and all.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Yes, no matter the stage...
